Title: Day 6: 9:00 P.M. - 10:00 P.M.
Plot:
Wayne risks his unstable health in order to fight Daniels for the presidency. Lennox and Karen call an uneasy truce in the face of the impending war.

Doyle coerces Nadia into helping him dig up dirt on Milo, while Jack uses Gredenko in a sting operation that will lead them to Fayed.
GuestStars: Adoni Maropis,  Powers Boothe,  Ryan Cutrona,  Joseph Hacker,  Bob Morrisey,  Brenda Wehle,  Rade Serbedzija,  Jim Holmes,  Lex Cassar,  Said Faraj,  Jolene Kim,  Rick Schroder,  Anthony Michael Jones,  Ray Laska
